    • decrementNumDie

      public void decrementNumDie(int decreVal)

    • calcScore

      public void calcScore(Dice dice)
      Calculates the score of a given roll by counting the number of each Face and then adding score based on that number. Combos include 3,4,5,6,7, and 8 in a row with each combo increasing in points awarded. Diamond and gold add 100 each on top of the combo score.
      Parameters:
      dice - dice of type Dice to check the given rolls of die to determine combos.

    • dieCombo

      public void dieCombo(int val)
      The dieCombo function calculates the score given the number of face within a die roll. The combos range from 3-8 and the scores range from 100-4000. Increasing accordingly with the combo number.
      Parameters:
      val - The number of a face within a die roll.

    • isWinner

      public void isWinner(Player player)
      isWinner function checks if a player has won not against another player based on score.
      Parameters:
      player - the player the score is being compared against.

    • winPercent

      public double winPercent()
      Calculates the win percentage the player has.
      Returns:
      The win percentage based on 42 games as a float.

    • gameReset

      public void gameReset()
      gameReset resets all the players stats back to default.
